replies.body: Maybe you should make a video hub of all your videos so that you don't have to keep creating new threads.
replies.body_tagged: Maybe you should make a video hub of all your videos so that you don't have to keep creating new threads.

replies.body:
Hey Man, A good idea would be to create a topic where you store all of your videos and reply to the topic when another is uploaded

Here is a example (https://avicus.net/forums/59226ca76)
